title: Immunizations - Crystal Medical Center Pharmacy - Your Local Oroville Pharmacy
description: Our pharmacy offers a variety of immunizations
cleaned_text: to disease prevention, immunizations are key. Not only does getting vaccinated protect you, but it protects those around you. Our highly qualified staff can easily administer these immunizations here at the pharmacy: - COVID-19 vaccines - Flu vaccines - Pneumococcal vaccine - A vaccine to prevent Shingles No appointments are required for immunizations,
